Articles.Content:
Hey guys, after being inspired by Mincespy\'s forum, I decided to make my own.

The link to it is here.

[http://cetrap.forumotion.co.uk/](http://cetrap.forumotion.co.uk/)

> 
> I assume this has Kerbals?

Hoo-kins.

Also, I need some help.

> 
> Hoo-kins.
> 
> Also, I need some help.

I advise using Kerbals, so it\'s fan content and you can actually post the link here that way.

But more than one race is okay, I suppose.

> 
> I advise using Kerbals, so it\'s fan content and you can actually post the link here that way.

That\'s void due to the fact that this has been posted in Off-Topic.
